description: Extreme weather, shifting conditions, varied terrain, motion and rest – these are alpine realities. The Alpha AR is a highly versatile hardshell designed to handle them. With GORE-TEX PRO Most Rugged reinforcements in high wear areas to increase durability. The StormHood™ delivers protection without impacting vision, a RECCO® reflector aids search and rescue, crossover chest pockets are easily accessible, and pit zips add ventilation.
name: Arcteryx Alpha AR Jacket - Mens
